title: Co-Founder of Square on New Book
itunes:title: Co-Founder of Square on New Book
description:
Jim McKelvey, Co-founder of Square, talks about his book “The Innovation Stack: Building an Unbeatable Business One Crazy Idea at a Time." He explains the process of how to ensure that a company is dominate in an industry. He also discusses starting Square with Jack Dorsey and his comic book.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
